homeHeader.title: Trade Confidently with a Commercial License in the UAE
homeHeader.description: Launch your retail store or scale your e-commerce in the UAE with a commercial license, empowering you to trade across borders and build a fully compliant business in the UAE. Our expert consultants streamline everything, from the attestation to approvals, so you never have to worry about paperwork or delays again.

leftSection_1.description: Engage in diverse commercial activities, from trading and distribution to retail. With a commercial license, you can operate locally, import & export goods, or sell online- all without risking compliance.

items.subTitle: Enjoy Exciting Tax Benefits
items.description: Maintain complete control of your business and retain full decision-making power. Grow your profit margins with 0% corporate tax and 100% capital repatriation requirements.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to register a commercial license in Dubai, UAE?
items.answer: Most commercial licenses require 5-10 working days, depending on your location and document readiness.

items.question: Do I need to secure an office space?
items.answer: It depends on the type of license you secure. If you get a mainland commercial license, you’ll have to secure a physical office. However, many free zones offer virtual office or flexi-desk solutions.

items.question: How long does a commercial license stay valid in the UAE?
items.answer: These generally stay valid for 1-3 years and can be renewed annually.

items.question: Can I get 100% ownership with a commercial license?
items.answer: Yes, you can enjoy full strategic control of your business with a commercial license

items.question: Can I apply for a bank account using a free zone commercial license?
items.answer: Absolutely! With a commercial license, you can open a corporate bank account with most local and international banks.
